urls_file.description: Relative or absolute path to a text file containing target URLs.

output_file.description: Relative or absolute path to the JSON file where results will be written.

sessions.description: Number of sessions; each session iterates over the full URL list.

max_interactions.description: Maximum number of automated interactions performed per URL.

concurrency.description: Number of concurrent workers that process URLs.

headless.description: Whether to run browsers in headless mode.

delay_between_sessions.description: Delay in seconds between processing URLs per worker.
